titles.title: You Are So Good To Me

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are so good to me, You heal my broken heart, You are my Father in Heaven. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my beautiful, my sweet sweet song (3x) I will sing again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You ride upon the clouds, You lead me to the truth, You are the Spirit inside me. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my beautiful, my sweet sweet song (3x) I will sing again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You poured out all Your blood, You died upon the cross, You are my Jesus who loves me. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my beautiful, my sweet sweet song (3x) I will sing again.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my strong melody, You are my dancing rhythm. You are my perfect rhyme, And I want to sing forever.{/lang-eng}
